A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Takes characters both old and new in exciting new directions. It takes what we know about the force and and gives it real meaning. Pacing was a bit off and a side plot or two wasn't too compelling\, but on the whole it is a bold\, exciting\, and emotional film. It is far from by the numbers and most interestingly we see that even the greatest of us can still have some learning to do and hope never dies.
